name: My Attendance
query:
select
  employee as "Employee",
  
  CAST(time AS date) as "Date:Date:100",
 
  Dayname(time) as "Day",
 
  shift as "Shift",
  
  CASE 
  WHEN log_type="IN"
  THEN Min(CAST(time AS time))
  END AS "InTIME" ,
  
  CASE 
  WHEN log_type="OUT"
  THEN Max(CAST(time AS time))
  END AS "OutTIME",
  
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(Hour,MIN(CAST(time AS time)),Max(CAST(time AS time))) AS "Total Hrs",
  
   CASE
   WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(Hour,Min(CAST(time AS time)),Max(CAST(time AS time))) >= 4.5 
   THEN 1  
   
    WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(Hour,MIN(CAST(time AS time)),Max(CAST(time AS time)))  = 0 
    THEN 0 
    
    WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(Hour,MIN(CAST(time AS time)),Max(CAST(time AS time)))  <=4.5 
    THEN 0.5 
    END AS "PORTION",
    
    CASE
    WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(Hour,Min(CAST(time AS time)),Max(CAST(time AS time))) > 9 
    THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(Hour,MIN(CAST(time AS time)),Max(CAST(time AS time)))-9 
    
    WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(Hour,Min(CAST(time AS time)),Max(CAST(time AS time))) < 9 
    THEN 0
    END AS "OT Hrs"
  

from  
   `tabEmployee Checkin` 

   
group by employee;
